Question: Kontech Electronics Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Kontech Electronics Co., Ltd

Product: Outdoor TV Display

- High brightness and waterproof technology
- QLED Quantum Dot Technology for increased color saturation
- Exported to over 100 countries and regions
- Trusted partner of BOE, Skyworth, Harman, and UEFA
- 5 National Invention Patents and over 100 other patents
- ISO9001 quality management system and various certifications (FCC, ETL, UL, SAA, ERP, etc.)
- Over 14 years of ODM/OEM experience in digital signage and commercial monitors
- Recognized as a National High-tech Enterprise and Guangdong Specialized and Innovative Enterprise
- Focus on industries such as Gaming & Entertainment, Food & Drink, Transportation, Healthcare, and Fitness
- Customized services and global network for customer support
Summary_cn:
康泰电子有限公司

产品：户外电视显示器

- 高亮度和防水技术
- QLED量子点技术提高了色彩饱和度
- 出口到100多个国家和地区
- BOE，创维，哈曼和欧足联的值得信赖合作伙伴
- 5项国家发明专利和100多项其他专利
- ISO9001质量管理体系和各种认证（FCC，ETL，UL，SAA，ERP等）
- 在数字标牌和商业显示器ODM/OEM领域具有14年以上经验
- 被认定为国家高新技术企业和广东专精特新企业
- 专注于游戏娱乐、餐饮、交通、医疗保健和健身等行业
- 提供定制服务和全球支持网络
